title: ALL HAIL THE POWER OF JESUS NAME

verses:
All hail the power of Jesus Name!
Let angels prostrate fall; (DC)
Bring forth the royal diadem,
and crown Him Lord of all.

Let highborn seraphs tune the lyre,
and as they tune it, fall; (DC)
Before His face Who tunes their choir,
and crown Him Lord of al

Crown Him, ye ning stars of light,
Who fixed this floating ball; (DC)
Now hail the strength of Israel's might,
and crown Him Lord of all,

Crown Him, ye martyrs of your God,
who from His altar call; (DC)
Extol the Stem of Jesse's Rod,
and crown Him Lord of all.

Ye seed of Israel's chosen race,
ye ransomed from the fall, (DC)
Hail Him Who saves you by His grace,
and crown Him Lord of all.

Hail Him, ye heir of David's line
Whom David Lord did call, (DC)
The God incarnate, Man divine
and crown Him Lord of all

Sinners, whose love can ne'er forget
the wornwood and the gall, (DC)
Go spread your trophies at His feet
and crown Him Lord of all

Let every tribe and every tongue
before Him prostrate fall (DC)
And shout in universal song
the crowned Lord of all.
